list.name: Changes
list.comment: Modification of the identification of the photometry Now, photometry points are identified by a spectral resolution=0.0. Before they were identified by a spectral resolution='P'.

task.summary: debugging: - calculation of the flx_obs_chi2: --- flx_obs_phot_ns_u -> modif_spec_chi2[5] - calculation of the err_obs_chi2: --- err_obs_phot_ns_u -> modif_spec_chi2[6] - calculation of the flx_mod_chi2: --- modif_spec_chi2[5] -> modif_spec_chi2[7]
Security test added for priors Now, when a living point is picked outside of the grid, it is adjusted to the edge of the grid to avoid extrapolation
Modification of the identification of the photometry Now, photometry points are identified by a spectral resolution=0.0. Before they were identified by a spectral resolution='P'.
